subject: Re: Nissan the movie.
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

Nicely said, Tim!

The results are what fascinate me.  They're compelling.  They're what I want to understand.

Thank you to everyone who's posting results here.  I'm listening to them as time permits, and learning with each one.

Cheerfully,
Fiona

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "tim_woolworth" <tim@...> wrote:
>
> ...

>The fact is that there are many people who use these boxes and if they do it at all seriously, then they get results...some of which are indicative of some intelligence trying to communicate with us.
>
